snippet.title: DOWNLOAD: August 2 Sunshine Coast Multisport Mecca edition
snippet.content:
ON Monday we lost one of the Coast's greatest contributors to multisport events in Australia. Garth Prowd crashed while cycling in Barcelona on July 22 and never recovered.
Download the latest edition to get the lowdown on:
Noosaville man killed in five-car fatal smash on Bruce Hwy NAPLAN results are improving but there is still a major problem Nine people from the Sunshine Coast region are listed as missing TEACHING at Nambour in the 1950s. EVERY mum wants to see their child live a long, happy life Maleny open day throws spotlight on theatre groups Bras and Bikes charity motorcycle ride is now in its 16th year FANTASY series thrown into chaos as hackers leak top secret scripts. Three contestants reveal lesbian encounters. Botched stunt does $40,000 worth of damage. THE Reef Hotel was the centre of Noosa's social scene. Social media erupted after she stepped out in the see-through top LOCAL radio station a constant on the Coast. The house featured on TV series Grand Designs Australia in 2014 What your money will get you in the Beef Cap v the capital city: Prime block lays dormant for decade in Coast town Rental vacancies disappear as Coast heads for boom
